.. _dense_bullet_list:

=================
Dense bullet list
=================

- This is a special case for bullet lists, where

  - And also wth some other on the same level.

  - only one newline is required, but still should work, even with multiline
    paragraphs

- And they may of course also be on a higher level without additional
  newlines.

This paragraph is obviously not part of the list.
